action.joinChannel: Join the Channel to send messages and receive notifications
action.waitingModeratorToJoin: You’re waiting to be accepted by a moderator

conversation.name: Name
conversation.roomLinkDescription: Copy this link and share it to provide others with access to this Room.
conversation.title: Title

conversations.mockDisplayDescription: Choose a conversation to start a chat
conversations.noActiveChats: There aren't active chats at the moment. Create a new chat or switch tab.
conversations.noActiveInstantMeetings: There aren't active Instant Meetings at the moment. Create a new Instant meeting or switch tab.
conversations.noActiveMeetings: There aren't active Rooms at the moment
conversations.noActiveSpaces: There aren't active Spaces at the moment. Create a new Space or switch tab.
conversations.noFilteredChats: There aren't chats that match this filter.
conversations.noFilteredInstantMeetings: There aren't Instant Meetings that match this filter.
conversations.noFilteredMeetings: There aren't Rooms or planned meetings that match this filter
conversations.noFilteredSpaces: There aren't Spaces that match this filter.

channel.mainDescription: Channels are a well-defined topic chats that are included into a Space. Space's participants can join the Channel to actively discuss about its topic. Participants can abandon the Channel without leaving the Space too.
channel.setImageAndTitleDescription: Set an image to better recognize the Channel inside the hosting Space. Channel's image can also be set or changed on Channel's info panel.
channel.titleInputRequirements: 140 characters allowed, title must be unique inside hosting Space
channel.topicDescription: Since Channels are chats driven by the topic discussed, a topic that better describe the subject is recommended.
channel.topicInputExplanation: It describes the subject of the Channel

chat.addParticipant: Choose a participant to start a chat with
chat.chatFilterDescription: You can create a chat just by clicking on the participant you want to talk to
chat.description: Chats are one-to-one conversations that help you to stay in touch with your contacts.

creation.emailReplicated: The e-mail entered has already been added

group.addParticipantsDescription: Invite participants by typing their name or e-mail addresses. You need to invite at least two other participants, otherwise you can create a Chat.
group.inputTopicDescriptionLabel: It describes the subject of the Group
group.mainDescription: Groups need to include more than two participants. Name the Group as preferred in order to describe its subject
group.setImageAndTopicDescription: Set an image that will help users to identify the Group within the ones in the list.

instantMeeting.addAttendees: Add attendees to your Instant Meeting
instantMeeting.addAttendeesDescription: Invite attendees by typing their name or e-mail address here.
instantMeeting.addAttendeesInputExplanation: You can invite also external users just by typing their e-mail address.

feedback.negative: The e-mail entered is not a valid one, please insert a valid address

instantMeeting.description: Instant Meetings are video calls that are designed to be quick and momentary, no trace of the chat will be kept and once the call is over, it will cease to exist. Instant Meetings can be created by Team Pro users and they can be joined also by external users.
instantMeeting.titleDescription: Give a recognizable title to the Instant Meeting, so your attendees will know the purpose of this call.

creation.limitOfParticipantReached: You have reached the limit of participants set by the administrator
creation.nameNeeds2Letters: Name needs at least two letters
creation.nameRequired-max140Characters-avoidReusi: Required. Max. 140 characters, avoid reusing names.
creation.requiresOneMoreParticipant: Requires at least one more participant
creation.selectMoreParticipantsForInstantMeetings: Select a participant from the list or type the address to add an external user

space.addMembersDescription: Invite people by typing their name or e-mail addresses. You need to invite at least two other people, otherwise you can create a Chat.
space.mainDescription: Spaces are generic communication environments that include specific chats called Channels, each one with its own topic. To create a Space you need to invite at least two participants. Channels can be added directly from the Space's info panel.
space.titleDescription: The title identifies the Space and thus it should describe its topic.
space.topicDescription: Since Spaces are chats driven by the topic discussed, a topic that better describes the subject is recommended.
space.topicInputExplanation: It describes the subject of the Space

creation.startTypingToPick: Start typing to pick an address
creation.titleInputRequirements: 140 characters allowed, title must be unique
creation.topicNeeds2Letters: The topic is optional. Min. 2 characters
creation.topicOptional: Optional. It describes the subject matter

errorPage.description: Check your link, it might be a wrong one
errorPage.title: Sorry, we couldn’t find that Room

login.externalLoginDescription: If you already belong to this domain, you will be redirected to your usual workspace. If you're an external user you will be redirected to a dedicated interface.

external.nobodyInTheRoom: It seems nobody is in this Room

waitingRoom.moderatorRefusedAccessToRoom: A moderator has refused your access to this Room
waitingRoom.userLeftLookForwardToSee: We look forward to seeing you again
waitingRoom.userLeftReturnToWaitingRoom: You can return to the waiting room at any time from the Room's link

external.youAreEnteringMeeting: You're about to enter the Room

feedback.offline: It seems to be a server connection issue

general.browserNotSupported: The version of your browser is not supported. It's highly recommended to update the browser to benefit from all the features!

meeting.defaultViewModeDedicatedLabel: The "Dedicated Mode" will redirect you to a separated tab of your browser to enjoy the Meeting experience at its best.
meeting.defaultViewModeDefaultLabel: Selecting the "Default Mode", the Meeting will start in the current internal environment.
meeting.defaultViewModeSecondaryDescriptionLabel: This option will be saved in your settings and can be updated every time you want.
meeting.errorMeetingRecording: It is not possible to start the registration, please contact your system administrator.
meeting.genericErrorMeeting: There seems to be a problem with this meeting, contact your system administrator.

interactions.muteUserForAllDescription: By muting the user, all the participants won't hear the user anymore. Only muted user can be unmute himself. Proceed?
interactions.mutedByModerators: You've been muted by a moderator, unmute yourself to speak

status.cameraMicOff: Your camera and microphone are off

meeting.resetMeetingUrlModalDescription: Are you sure to reset the link for planned "{{conversationName}}"?

startModal.description: How do you want to enter the meeting?

meeting.wereToFindRecording: The recording will be saved in the video server home, contact your system administrator for further details.

modal.addModeratorDescription: Select one or more users to promote them to moderators of this Room
modal.clearHistoryDescription: This conversation is now empty, it has been moved to the bottom of the conversations list in order to emphasize the active ones.

confirm.clearHistory: You will clear permanently your chat history. Other participants' history of this chat won't be deleted. This action is irreversible.
confirm.deleteChannel: Are you sure to delete this Channel?
confirm.deleteRoom: Are you sure to delete the Room?
confirm.deleteSpace: Are you sure to delete this Space?
confirm.leaveAndDeleteConversation: Are you sure you want to leave and delete {{conversationName}}?
confirm.leaveChannel: Are you sure to leave the Channel?
confirm.leaveGroup: Are you sure to leave the Group?
confirm.leaveSpace: Are you sure to leave the Space?
confirm.removeMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

modal.deleteMessageDescription: When deleting a message, it won't be visibile anymore for you and all other recipients

instantMeeting.continue: Continue with the old Instant Meeting
instantMeeting.endCallByOwner: The owner of the Instant Meeting has decided to end the call, we hope you enjoyed the Instant Meeting experience
instantMeeting.instantMeetingAlreadyRunningText: Creating a new one will overwrite the older one and your attendee will lose the connection, what do you want to do?
instantMeeting.instantMeetingAlreadyRunningTitle: An Instant Meeting is already running

modal.moderatorCannotLeaveGroupDescription: You're the only moderator of {{conversationName}}, please promote someone else before leaving the Group.
modal.moderatorCannotLeaveGroupTitle: Wait, a new moderator is needed
modal.planMeetingDescription: Room's name helps the attendees to know the Room's matter of discussion.
modal.roomsFunctionalitiesChangelogDescription: We have made important changes to the meeting functionalities. Read the introduction to the Rooms to find out more!

stopMeetingRec.stopRecording: The recording will be stopped. You can start a new recording anytime during this meeting.

modal.userJoinedWaitingRoom: There seems to be someone in the Waiting Room

notification.startMeetingRecording: The recording of the {{conversationName}}'s meeting has started

waiting.descriptionAcceptedLabel: You have been accepted by the moderator of {{conversationName}}
waiting.descriptionWaitingLabel: You’re waiting to be accepted by {{conversationName}}’s Moderator
waiting.notificationAcceptedByModerator: You have been accepted by the moderator
waiting.notificationJoinTheRoom: Join the room to take part in the meeting
waiting.userIsWaiting: New user is waiting to enter
waiting.userJoinedWaitingRoom: There seems to be someone in the waiting room

organizeYourMeeting: Organize your own meetings or join your colleagues' Rooms

meeting.description: Set your audio and video preferences to enter meetings. You can always customize your preferences before entering any meeting.
meeting.personalRoomResetDescription: By resetting Personal Room's link, all the previously given accesses will not work anymore.

modal.description: Here you can set all Chats' dedicated preferences in order to enjoy a complete customized chatting experience!
modal.title: Chats settings

notifications.description: Set your preferences for every type of notifications in Chats.

profile.statusOptionalDescription: Optional. Let others now what are you thinking about. Max lenght: 256 characters

tooltip.copyUserRoomTooltip: Copy this link and share it to provide others with access to your Personal Room
